```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(testactionspkg)
path <- system.file("extdata", "small.csv", package = "testactionspkg")
```

Attempt to read a file and manipulate .col_names.
```{r col_names F}
testactionspkg::read(path, .col_names = FALSE)
```


```{r col_names T}
testactionspkg::read(path, .col_names = TRUE)
```

Attempt to read a file and manipulate .name_repair
```{r name_repair minimal}
testactionspkg::read(path, .name_repair = "minimal")
```


```{r name_repair unique}
testactionspkg::read(path, .name_repair = "unique")
```


```{r name_repair universal}
testactionspkg::read(path, .name_repair = "universal")
```
